Title: Inception
description: A skilled thief enters dreams to steal secrets and plant ideas, blurring reality and imagination.

Title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest psychological and moral challenge against the Joker in Gotham City.

Title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

Title: Avengers Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble one final time to reverse the devastation caused by Thanos.

Title: Titanic
description: A tragic love story unfolds aboard the ill-fated luxury ship Titanic.

Title: Joker
description: A troubled comedian descends into madness, becoming Gotham’s most infamous villain.

Title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge in the arena against a corrupt emperor.

Title: The Matrix
description: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation and joins a rebellion against its controllers.

Title: Forrest Gump
description: A simple man’s extraordinary life journey intersects with major moments in American history.

Title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of a powerful crime family transfers control to his reluctant son.

Title: Parasite
description: A poor family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household with unexpected consequences.

Title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men form a bond while seeking redemption and freedom over decades.

Title: Doctor Strange
description: A former surgeon learns mystical arts to defend Earth from supernatural threats.

Title: Iron Man
description: A billionaire engineer builds a powered suit and becomes a high-tech superhero.

Title: Spider-Man No Way Home
description: Peter Parker faces multiverse chaos when his identity is exposed.

Title: Black Panther
description: The king of Wakanda must protect his nation from powerful global enemies.

Title: Avatar
description: A marine becomes torn between duty and conscience on the alien world of Pandora.

Title: Dune
description: A noble family becomes entangled in a war over a valuable desert planet.

Title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators confront a dark supernatural presence in a haunted farmhouse.

Title: It
description: A group of children face an ancient evil that preys on their deepest fears.

Title: A Quiet Place
description: A family must live in silence to survive creatures that hunt by sound.

Title: John Wick
description: A retired assassin seeks vengeance against those who wronged him.

Title: Mission Impossible
description: An elite agent undertakes dangerous missions to stop global threats.

Title: Fast and Furious
description: Street racers become unlikely heroes in high-octane global missions.

Title: La La Land
description: Two dreamers fall in love while pursuing their ambitions in Los Angeles.

Title: The Notebook
description: A timeless love story spanning decades of passion and sacrifice.

Title: Crazy Rich Asians
description: A woman meets her boyfriend’s wealthy family and faces cultural challenges.

Title: The Social Network
description: The rise of Facebook and the conflicts behind the world’s largest social platform.

Title: Oppenheimer
description: The story of the scientist behind the creation of the atomic bomb.

Title: The Prestige
description: Two rival magicians engage in a deadly battle to create the ultimate illusion.
